issue.title: [C++] Implement ExtensionType for non-UTF8 Unicode data
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6455](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6455). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For use cases where it's OK to transport such data as binary (without transcoding to UTF-8)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6455?focusedCommentId=16931595) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Does this need a dedicated extension type, or simply a standardized metadata key for a binary column?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6455?focusedCommentId=17287796) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Closing this until it can be demonstrated that it's actually needed
